name: Clicky game
description: A memory game built using React

name: Trivia game
description: A a trivia game using HTML/CSS, Javascript, and Jquery, focusing on TimeOut requests.

name: Friend Finder
description: An application where a user takes a survey and gets matched up with a friend in the database based on responses given. Application utilizes Node.js and Express.

name: Burgers
description: Utilize MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars, and a custom ORM. Use MVC design pattern: Use Node and MySQL to query and route data, and Handlebars to generate the HTML.
